data: {"generalSituation":"Winds will be weak over Guangdong tomorrow. It will be warm during the day and relatively humid in the morning and at night. A fresh to strong northeast monsoon is expected to reach the coast of southern China from the night of Lunar New Year's Eve to Lunar New Year's Day. It will be cloudier with one or two rain patches over the region. It will be cool in the morning on the second and third days of Lunar New Year. With the monsoon moderating in the following couple of days, winds will be weak and there will be sunny periods during the day over the coastal areas of Guangdong.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260215","week":"Sunday","forecastWind":"East force 2 to 3.","forecastWeather":"Cloudy periods and coastal fog in the morning and at night.
